This is a technique used by Mukade while in his Ultimate Form. By taking advantage of his puppet body, Mukade extends additional blades and spikes on his centipede-segmented body. He then spins his own body at every joint, creating powerful gusts of wind and inflicting massive area damage to his vicinity.
